name: FPSASCII
description:
FPSASCII is a 3D first-person roguelike game with simple ASCII visuals. The game features random generated 3D mazes, pick-ups, enemies, permadeath and simplistic turn-based gameplay. Gather yellow $ characters to gain scoring, look for a blue < character to exit to the next level and beware red letters.

CONTROLS:
W: Move forward
S: Move backward
A: Turn left
D: Turn right
Esc: Pause menu

ASCII CHARACTERS:
@  is Life
$  is Score
<  is a Staircase up
^  is a Trap
#  is a Wall
.  is a Floor space
!  is a Teleport
?  spawns a random character
